title: As soon as Cinderhulk gets nerfed Nidalee is gonna dominate the jungle again
body:
She's been forced out of the meta temporarily due to cinderhulk because it allows tank junglers to actually have an impact on the game so once Riot nerfs it (because we can't have that can we) she's gonna come back just as broken OP as she was before the meta shift.

So I vote we kick the cougar while she's down so we don't have to deal with this abomination of a champion until she gets an actual rework that makes her not toxic as shit to play against in some three odd years.

Anyone else of the same opinion?

replies.body: i was on a team with a nidalee that died to jungle creeps 4 times. idk if that's an indicator of that player's skill or jungle nid in general?
Considering Nidalee has one of the best clears in the game that's most definitely indicative of player skill, he/she was probably still learning the champion

> [{quoted}](name=vfactor95,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9ZKzmZUH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-27T00:40:09.232+0000)
>
> Considering Nidalee has one of the best clears in the game that's most definitely indicative of player skill, he/she was probably still learning the champion

Uhhhh, she's not as slow as a lot of Tank junglers used to be, but best? With low base ad, the latest trap change making her traps no longer deal %health damage, and a bugfix that fixed her cougar cd's resetting has nerfed her clears over time.

Well. that was the Reason why Nidalee wasn't nerfed in [patch 5.6](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-56-notes#patch-nidalee), a [little nerf in 5.7 ](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-57-notes#patch-nidalee)buuut... Less health per level, that's exacly the problem hur hur hur.


So i think like you, Cinderhulk nerfed to the grown (Like usual), nidalee is gonna pop again.

"Am I the only one who thinks we should nerf a champion who is already not good?"

You should be. If and when a meta that favours Nidalee comes in she can be nerfed, but nerfing before then accomplishes nothing good.
The only thing they are nerfing is cinderhulk damage to minions (Maybe champions too), but they are increasing its damage on monsters.
Upvoted. This bitch has been toxic for far too long.
I thought she is still a god tier this patch... 1 spear = dead

heheheheheheheheAHAHHAHAHAHAAHH... I have a new solution to destroy any NIDALEE AHAHAHH. 





BAN HER! or we can tweak her a bit. Now how? i dont want downvotes but ill leave that to you Dear, Vfactor95
